sentences.en: Don't hand me that hero veteran crap.
sentences.cn: 别在我面前卖弄你那战斗老英雄的一套了.

sentences.en: He might be dead after tonight if he didn't stop all this crap, Michael thought grimly.
sentences.cn: 迈克尔把事情想得很可怕:如果他还把那一套废话挂在嘴上, 那他今天晚上过后也就没命了.

sentences.en: He said harshly, " That's the worst kind of juvenile crap I've ever heard.
sentences.cn: 他粗声粗气他说: “ 你这些话,简直就像从小青年嘴里冒出来的最荒诞不经的胡言乱语.

sentences.en: He used to crap around like that.
I am so fed up with your bull shit , cut the crap.
sentences.cn: 真是受够了, 废话少说.

sentences.en: It is a tedious, humourless load of crap.
sentences.cn: 那是一堆枯燥乏味、毫无幽默感的废话。

sentences.en: Sherman Grome's crap game was listed on the big board at six.
sentences.cn: 大告示牌上列出谢尔曼?格罗姆的掷骰子游戏是在6点钟.

sentences.en: That crap you put out, I understand, bread and butter.
sentences.cn: 你们出版那些无聊的东西是因为生计攸关,这我明白.

sentences.en: They will think you're handing them a line of crap.
sentences.cn: 人家总以为你乱吹一气.

sentences.en: To General Dreedle, who ran a fighting outfit, It'seemed a lot of crap.
sentences.cn: 在德里德尔将军(他指挥着一支战斗部队)看来, 这纯粹是胡扯.

sentences.en: We shipped a lot of crap out of Detroit in our day.
sentences.cn: 当时我们就曾从底特律把大量劣货装运出去.

sentences.en: What is all this crap doing on my desk?
sentences.cn: 我桌上的这些破玩意是干什么的？

sentences.en: You do talk a load of crap!
You're the kind of person who affiliates himself with the kind of crap they spout.
sentences.cn: 你这种人就会去附和他们的那些废话。

trans.tran_en: things that are useless or unimportant
to pass waste matter from your  bowels

trans.tran_cn: 掷骰子，拉屎，〈俚〉放弃计划（等），〈俚〉休息，打盹
